title: Synapsis - Vectorisation as a Service
description:
Retrieving vector embeddings from petabytes of images, videos or text is challenging to scale, while having full control of its quality and a high precision in search system.
Quasara helps managing your ingestion pipeline to retrieve high-quality vector embeddings using the latest embedding models. We want to enable our customers to build a new wave of enterprise applications for data exploration, RAG, deep memories or real-time analytics; and reduce time-to-market for AI applications.
